io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.gui.theme

Interface Theme

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTheme

    public interface Theme
    The interface for defining a theme for the GUI system. Scaling must be done when rendering a component with this interface.
    Author:
    Tomaso2468

    • Method Summary

      • paintComponent

        void paintComponent(Graphics g,
                    float scaling,
                    Component c)
        Paints the graphics of the component.
        Parameters:
        g - The current graphics context.
        scaling - The scaling of the GUI.
        c - The component to render.

                    float scaling,

        scaling - The scaling of the GUI.
        c - The container to render.

        org.newdawn.slick.geom.Rectangle calculateButtonBounds(Container c,
                                                       Button b)
        Calculates the bounds for a button based on the specified container.
        Parameters:
        c - The container the component is in.
        b - The button for bounds to be calculated for.
        Returns:
        A rectangle object.
